RelatedSentence: Kenya 's shilling fell to the lowest in nine months on concern that a spate of attacks in the capital , Nairobi , and the port city of Mombasa may undermine tourism in East Africa 's biggest economy .

A1: a growing number of attacks since sending troops
RelatedSentence: Kenya has faced a growing number of attacks since sending troops to fight Islamist militants in neighboring Somalia in October 2011 .
The deaths add to the 54 people who have died nationwide since al - Qaeda - linked militants stormed a Nairobi mall in September and killed at least 67 people .
